reviews.review_text: we need swat4 !!! F-U CK the Activision

Great old games. Awesome neon pink and 90's feel to it. Don't expect these game to hand you any easy ones. This is the old school Sierra type where you are given few to no pointers. Great games, but poor port job. It is just a quick DosBox fix. If I wanted that I could have just Dosboxed my old diskette copies myself. Because of the shoddy job the game will regularly crash. I had it crash 4 times in 20 minutes. Not cool Sierra. I would recommend if not for the crashes.
